rationale: DropdownMenu component only handles click-outside to close (line 586-595). Keyboard-only users cannot close the dropdown with Escape, navigate items with Arrow keys, or have focus properly managed. This fails WCAG 2.1.1 Keyboard accessibility.
problemSolved: DropdownMenu (lines 577-664) uses click handlers only. No onKeyDown handlers for Escape or Arrow navigation. Focus doesn't move into the dropdown when opened. DropdownMenuItem (line 634-651) only responds to onClick, not keyboard events.
